subtitleNullable: A time-series dataset for joint news and market data analysis of stocks
descriptionNullable:
Stock-NewsEventsSentiment (SNES) 1.0  is a dataset consisting of market and news time series data for S&P 500 companies over a period of 21 months (October 2020 to July 2022). The dataset contains the following parameters for each company (daily ticks):

- Market data: Stock price and trade volumes
- News data (volume of articles):
-- Sentiment (positive/negative)
-- New Products
-- Layoffs
-- Analyst Comments
-- Stocks
-- Dividends
-- Corporate Earnings
-- Mergers & Acquisitions
-- Store Openings
-- Product Recalls
-- Adverse Events
-- Personnel Changes
-- Stock Rumours

Resources:

- Read more about SNES 1.0 [here](https://medium.com/@parsaghaffari/stock-newseventssentiment-snes-1-0-a92c8748b2c3)
- Check out [Aylien's News API](https://aylien.com/product/news-api) - the main API behind this dataset.
- See the code used for compiling the dataset [here](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1Nd5aDPNxL44pVesv4muIqBN8xwQI9hfV?authuser=1#scrollTo=nTCT0ZgZWWyu).
